Name: French Monkey
Instructions: SHAKE first three ingredients with ice and strain into ice-filled glass. TOP with just a splash of soda.
Review: Apple, Scotch and elderflower, honeyed and floral.
History: Created in 2006 by yours truly for our French friend, Xavier Padovani, who at the time was the man behind Monkey Shoulder whisky .
Nutrition: One serving of French Monkey contains 177 calories
